body_html:
I checked again, and this may be your problem:

INFO: From Compiling external/nccl_archive/src/libwrap.cu.cc: gcc: error trying to exec 'as': execvp: No such file or directory

Looks like as is not installed in your system
Could you try sudo apt-get install build-essential

body:
I checked again, and this may be your problem:
```
INFO: From Compiling external/nccl_archive/src/libwrap.cu.cc: gcc: error trying to exec 'as': execvp: No such file or directory
```
Looks like `as` is not installed in your system
Could you try `sudo apt-get install build-essential`
